definition: lucky/auspicious/propitious
lucky/giga- (meaning billion or 10^9)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
auspicious/propitious
mascot

sentences.english: It symbolizes good fortune, Gangnam civil called "the head of wealth."
sentences.chinese: 它象征着吉祥，江南民间称之为“富贵不断头”。

sentences.english: It is the last day of qi yue and our geomancer says it is auspicious.
sentences.chinese: 那是七月的最后一天，风水师父说是个吉祥的日子。

sentences.english: Instead, they honored him, by adopting the breed as the official firehouse mascot.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他们尊敬它，用它来作为消防队的正式吉祥物。

sentences.english: One of the Four Auspicious Animals. It can stop the evil things and improve the environment.
sentences.chinese: 为吉祥四瑞兽之一，其功效能挡蔽诸煞，改善风水。

sentences.english: The sculpture is interesting for the refined or clumsy style, and its theme is propitious, the color jubilating .
sentences.chinese: 泥玩雅拙有趣，题材吉祥，色彩喜庆，别有情趣。

sentences.english: Jixiang products not only have excellent quality, but also have variety of patterns.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥的产品不仅品质优良，而且花样繁多。

sentences.english: Homes are often decorated with cutouts of Chinese auspicious phrases and couplets.
sentences.chinese: 衡宇往往粉饰纸剪纸吉祥的中文词组和对子。

sentences.english: Beat base on quarter have lucky pattern, among them what the front engraves is animal of lion body luck.
sentences.chinese: 鼓座基上刻有吉祥图案，其中正面刻的是狮形瑞兽。

sentences.english: "Three Rams Bringing Bliss" is one popular auspicious design among the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: “三羊开泰”是中国民间常见的吉祥图案。

sentences.english: Buddha illuminates, safe and happy. Paradise on death.
sentences.chinese: 佛光普照，事事顺利，吉祥如意，幸福平安。

sentences.english: At this time of my parting, wish me good luck, my friends!
sentences.chinese: 在我动身的时候，祝我吉祥如意吧，我的朋友们。

sentences.english: May Buddha Bless You With Safety And Fortune.
In Chinese mythology, the Licorne is an auspicious objects.
sentences.chinese: 在中国神话中，独角兽是一种吉祥之物。

sentences.english: The Master gave souvenirs to his disciples, hoping that this would bring them auspiciousness and good health.
sentences.chinese: 恩师为弟子们发送纪念品，祝愿六时吉祥，身心健康。

definition: auspicious sign
moral (of a story)/lesson to be learned/implication/message/import/metaphorical meaning
lit. (may the) five blessings descend upon this home (namely: longevity, wealth, health, virtue, and a natural death)/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
to accept a life of ease/to enjoy a comfortable retirement
good luck and long life
auspicious/propitious/good fortune
happiness and longevity
long-lived people, rich harvests (idiom); stable and affluent society/prosperity
lucky/giga- (meaning billion or 10^9)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
lit. (may you) have abundance year after year/(an auspicious saying for the Lunar New Year)
lit. inviting wealth/We wish you success and riches (cf idiom 招財進寶|招财进宝[zhao1 cai2 jin4 bao3])
May you have peace year after year (New Year's greeting)
lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
lucky omen
the more sons, the more happiness (idiom)
